
The chemical@hirlam.org is now setup, with the initial subscribers as listed in https://hirlam.org/mailman/roster/chemical

The mailing list subscription is open to all in the community. Those that are not already in the list can either write to xiaohua@hirlam.org for requesting subscription assistance, or go directly to the interface him/herself at https://hirlam.org/mailman/listinfo/chemical to subscribe. The latter requires normal access to hirlam.org server though.

The archive for the mailing list will be available on https://hirlam.org/pipermail/chemical/ which is also open to all non-subscribers within HIRLAM/ALADIN communities.
